resources.string: There are no saved maps to load.
Why not press "back" and create one?

 Not all token images are compatible with the LGPL. They are provided for this distribution of the application only. Please ensure that you have artist permission before redistributing these icons or including them in a commercial distribution of Dungeon Sketch.

This is a low-security feature intended to guard against accidental peeking - like a real GM screen.


It will not encrypt your data. It is easily circumvented. It will not thwart players determined to find out where your diabolical traps are.


Please do not use GM Screen to protect anything actually important, like banking credentials, nuclear secrets, or your totally secret diary.
To reset the GM Screen PIN in the future, simply turn this feature off and on again.
Please enter the GM Screen PIN to see the background or GM Notes views.
